Melbourne captain Cameron Smith and coach Craig Bellamy both addressed the Warriors players after their 50-6 demolition at the hands of the Storm on Friday night.

articles.author: Dan Walsh
articles.title: Play on: Bankwest turf cleared for blockbuster after Roosters injuries - NRL.COM
articles.description: The playing surface at Bankwest Stadium has been cleared to host its 10th game in 21 days with Saturday's Eels-Raiders match going ahead as scheduled.
articles.content:
The playing surface at Bankwest Stadium has been cleared to host its 10th game in 21 days with Saturday's Eels-Raiders match going ahead as scheduled.
